category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCDigitalSigningApplicationPref
preference.preference_description: Defines the priority list of applications used by the Digitally Sign command on the selected base datasets. Valid Values: Accepts one or more strings as values. Each string must be a valid tool object name, for example, PDF_Tool. Only a tool name that is digital signature capable (Digital Signature Capable option is selected) is valid.
